note.p: Italian gardener. Assistant gardener at the botanical garden Giardino dei Semplici in Florence, 1849; head gardener, 1858; director, 1869; later chief curator. Teacher in the school of pharmacy in Florence; assistant professor of natural history at the Technical Institute in Florence, 1867–84.
Bulletino della R. Società Toscana di Orticultura 2d ser. 2 (1887): 255–6.
